plot: A local milkman seeks revenge after Father Ted gets him fired.

Ted is shocked to find that Pat Mustard, the island milkman, has been having sex with his lady customers - possibly including Mrs. Doyle - and reports him to the dairy manager. As a result Pat gets sacked and Dougal takes on the delivery route, as the manager trusts a man of God. A vengeful Mustard has attached a bomb to the milk float which will activate at four miles an hour and detonate if the speed then falls below four. Ted manages to save Dougal thanks to a decorative brick that Mrs Doyle has brought into the house and Pat Mustard ends up literally - and fatally - hoisted by his own petard.—don @ minifie-1
